title: Love Island Australia's Vanessa Sierra locks lips with a mystery man
text:
She reunited with her Love Island co-star Sam Withers in Adelaide this week, after the pair came close to having a fling in Fiji while filming the reality show.

But any hopes Sam had of hooking up with Vanessa Sierra have now been dashed, as the stunning model was spotted locking lips with a mystery man on Thursday.

The brunette beauty, 24, and her new beau couldn't keep their hands or lips off one another as they took a romantic stroll around a park.

Sorry Sam! Love Island Australia's Vanessa Sierra enjoyed a romantic date with a mystery man in Adelaide on Thursday

Vanessa looked absolutely smitten with her new beau, grinning from ear-to-ear as he wrapped his arm around her.

She flaunted her curves in tiny, figure-hugging shorts and a bright orange top.

Her long-haired mystery suitor opted for a casual look too, in chino shorts and a baggy denim shirt.

Their public smooch comes one day after Vanessa reunited with Love Island co-star Sam Withers.

That didn't take long! The brunette beauty and her new beau couldn't keep their hand or lips off one another as they took a romantic stroll around a park

Happy as a clam! Vanessa looked absolutely smitten with her new beau, grinning from ear-to-ear as he wrapped his arm around her

The pair, who bonded in the villa before Sam's elimination, caught up for an afternoon lunch date, also in Adelaide.

Vanessa and Sam appeared to pick up right where they left off, embracing warmly as soon as they saw each other.

After hugging, the genetically-blessed duo sat down at a nearby cafe for coffee.

Vanessa was evicted from the Love Island villa on Monday after she ended up in the bottom three couples with her partner Matt Zukowski.

Looking good! Vanessa flaunted her curves in tiny, figure-hugging shorts and a bright orange top

Tatt's got to hurt! She also showed off her large sleeve tattoo that extends to under her arm

Oh dear: Their public smooch comes one day after Vanessa reunited with Love Island co-star Sam Withers

While Matt was saved in the vote, the remaining boys accused Vanessa of playing a game and chose her to be dumped from the island.

Model Matt was devastated by the decision, but soon after exiting the villa, Vanessa revealed she wouldn't be waiting for him on the outside.

Instead, she hoped to explore a possible spark with fellow islander Sam.

He came out of nowhere: The sighting of the pair came as a shock as she had also been spotted with Sam in Adelaide

Dethroned! Vanessa and her partner Matt Zukoswki (pictured) were split apart by the surprise dumping on Love Island Australia this week after branding themselves the 'king and queen' of the villa

End of the road: Vanessa was evicted from the Love Island villa after she ended up in the bottom three couples
description: She reunited with her Love Island Australia co-star Sam Withers in Adelaide this week, after they came close to having a fling in Fiji while filming the show.
